model.name: VC-ARM - Verifiable Credentials Achitecture Reference Model (ARM)
model.documentation:
This is the architecture reference model (ARM) for Verified Credentials.
1. Click on Views in the left pane. 2. Click on the name of a View. 3. Click on an element in the selected View.

node.label: Verifiable Credentials Architecture Reference Model (VC-ARM) 0.2 - Holder
